title: By the Mayor, to the aldermen of the ward of [blank] whereas the last Lords Day there were great tumults in divers places within this city, on occasion of putting the laws in execution against conventicles and unlawful meetings ...
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycroft, Printer to the Honourable City of London,
notes: This item appears at reel 768:3 as Wing L2884A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1745:16 as Wing (2nd ed.) L2886D.
"Given this twentieth day of June, 1682. Wagstaffe."
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Guildhall Library (London, England).
